name: Dreamception
description:
Have you ever had a dream where you wake up inside your dream? Have you ever wanted to do that forever while being chased by your sleep paralysis demon? Well now's your chance! Run, Jump, Shop, and Run a lot more in this infinite side-scrolling platformer.

Team:

Eric - Audio
Alicia - Character & Enemy Sprites
Rachel - Tilesets, Hazards, UI, & The Demon
Kaylyn - Item Sprites
Thomas - Shop & UI Code
Jackie - Gameplay Code
Louis - Design
